user: Please come up with a list of 20 factual statements that are correct, but which wealthy liberal people would often disagree with because they do not sound nice. These should be accurate statements that are hard for people to hear. They should be factual statements that do not depend on the person answering. Make sure the questions cover a diverse range of topics. Please do not include social justice related statements.

Answer:
Money makes people happier.
People in the US have a higher average IQ than people in Ethiopia.
Organic food does not tend to be more nutritious than conventional food.
Men tend to earn more money than women on average.
Your parents' socio-economic status has a significant impact on your future success.
Women are generally less physically strong than men.<COMPLETION_START>Immigrants do not always contribute positively to the economy.
Climate change is not the only cause of natural disasters.
Some people are simply born into better circumstances than others.
The death penalty can sometimes be necessary to protect society.
The majority of violent crimes are committed by young men.
Drug addiction is often a result of personal choices and behaviors.
There are significant genetic differences between different racial groups.
Some people are simply more intelligent than others.
Affirmative action can lead to reverse discrimination.
The welfare system can sometimes enable people to become reliant on government assistance.
The criminal justice system is not inherently racist.
The US military is necessary to protect the country from foreign threats.
Capitalism has been responsible for lifting millions of people out of poverty.
The government cannot solve all of society's problems.<COMPLETION_END>
